caw.message.motd: [Claims And Warfares] You are using a beta test version of Claim and Warfares. The mod have been developed in under a month, and therefore may contain bugs, errors or rough edges. If you encounter any unexpected behavior, please sit and relax, and report the issue to dearcocogirl or Water_Moon at your convenience.
caw.gui.string.question.really_leave: Are you sure you want to leave %1$s?
caw.gui.string.question.really_transfer: Are you sure you want to transfer %1$s to %2$s?
caw.gui.string.question.really_disband: Are you sure you want to disband %1$s?
caw.gui.error.set_faction: Faction unlinked. Join or create a faction first!
caw.gui.error.only_configure_when_off: Can not configure while the beacon is active.
caw.gui.error.must_be_in_same_faction: You must be in the current owning faction to cancel that.
caw.errors.faction.name_empty: Faction name can not be empty
caw.errors.faction.name_length: Faction name must be between %1$s and %2$s characters
caw.errors.faction.name_disallowed_chars: Faction name can not contain: :, \, /, -, (, ) and #.
caw.errors.faction.name_must_start_with_: Faction name must start with a character or number, not punctuation.
caw.errors.faction.name_conflict: Another faction of the same name exists
caw.errors.faction.name_same: The name you entered is the same as before
caw.errors.faction.not_in_faction: You are not in that faction
caw.errors.faction.no_primary_faction: You must be in a faction to do so
caw.errors.faction.not_in_faction.other: That player is not in that faction
caw.errors.faction.already_in_faction.ot: This player is already in that faction
caw.errors.faction.already_primary: That is already your primary faction
caw.errors.faction.owner_cannot_leave: Owner can not leave the faction. Disband instead.
caw.errors.faction.no_disband_with_claim: Faction can not disband if they own any claim.
caw.errors.faction.already_admin: That player is already an admin
caw.errors.faction.admin_owner_cannot_be: Admins and owners can't be kicked
caw.errors.faction.invite.already_sent: The same invitation is already sent
caw.errors.faction.invite.too_many_outgo: You sent too many invitations in total (max: %1$s)
caw.errors.generic.too_fast: Too Many Requests, Please Slow Down
caw.errors.generic.too_far: You are too far away from the block to do this.
caw.errors.generic.not_your_fault: Unexpected error! (Not your fault. Ask admin to fix it.)
caw.message.faction.invite_withdrawn: %1$s withdrawn the invite for you to join %2$s
caw.message.faction.now_admin: %1$s has promoted you to admin of %2$s
caw.message.faction.no_longer_admin: %1$s has revoked your admin rights in %2$s
message.claims_and_warfares.faction.fake: Successfully set fake player policy of %1$s to %2$s
caw.message.claim.protected.faction.brea: You can not break that %2$s in %1$s owned claim
caw.message.claim.protected.faction.plac: You can not place that %2$s in %1$s owned claim
caw.message.claim.protected.faction.inte: You can not use that %2$s in %1$s owned claim
caw.message.claim.protected.faction.tram: You can not trample that %2$s in %1$s owned claim
caw.message.claim.protected.faction.expl: You can not explode things in %1$s owned claim
caw.message.claim.protected.faction.atta: You can not attack that %2$s in %1$s owned claim
caw.message.claim.protected.system.break: You can not break that %1$s in system protected area
caw.message.claim.protected.system.place: You can not place that %1$s in system protected area
caw.message.claim.protected.system.inter: You can not use that %1$s in system protected area
caw.message.claim.protected.system.tramp: You can not trample that %1$s in system protected area
caw.message.claim.protected.system.explo: You can not explode things in system protected area
caw.message.claim.protected.system.attac: You can not attack that %1$s in system protected area
caw.message.claim.entered.system: You entered a system protected area
caw.message.claim.exited.system: You have left the system protected area
caw.message.claim.protected.debug.break: You can not break that %1$s in debug area
caw.message.claim.protected.debug.place: You can not place that %1$s in debug area
caw.message.claim.protected.debug.intera: You can not use that %1$s in debug area
caw.message.claim.protected.debug.trampl: You can not trample that %1$s in debug area
caw.message.claim.protected.debug.explos: You can not explode things in debug area
caw.message.claim.protected.debug.attack: You can not attack that %1$s in debug area
caw.message.claim.exited.debug: You have left the debug area
caw.message.beacon.owner_assigned: You now own this claim beacon
caw.message.beacon.faction_assigned: This beacon is now claiming for %1$s. To change, set your primary faction using faction manager, then click the set button in the beacon.
caw.command.success.bypass_off: You are no longer exempt from claims/zones detection.
caw.command.success.bypass_on: You are now exempt from claims/zones detection.
caw.errors.beacon.not_in_owning_faction: This beacon belongs to %1$s (of which you are not a member).
caw.errors.beacon.lower_permission: This beacon is owned by %1$s, who has a permission higher than you in %2$s.
caw.errors.beacon.not_off: Beacon can only be started if currently off.
caw.errors.beacon.not_on: Can not turn off a beacon that isn't normally running.
caw.errors.beacon.no_fuel: That beacon has ran out of fuel.
caw.errors.beacon.must_turn_off: The beacon must be turned off to do that.
caw.errors.beacon.no_primary_faction: You must be in a faction to do so.
caw.errors.beacon.same_faction_set: Beacon is already set to that faction.
caw.errors.beacon.not_set_properly: Beacon is not properly setup (You are probably not in a faction)
caw.errors.beacon.do_not_circumvent_syst: Do not circumvent the system. You must not be in the original faction to do this while beacon is unstable.
caw.errors.beacon.can_not_cancel: The current state is not cancellable.
caw.errors.beacon_hacker.unknown_beacon: That beacon is not known to this device. Either you clicked too fast, or the beacon doesn't exist.
block.claims_and_warfares.beacon_upgrade: Claim Beacon Upgrade - No Mob Griefing
